title: TikTok Has Advice for What to Do if You Win the Lottery
description: As excitement peaked over a record-breaking Powerball, TikTok creators cashed in by offering financial advice.
dc:creator: Madison Malone Kircher

media:content.media:description: Despite the incredibly low odds of winning the lottery, many TikTok users are rapt by videos on the platform offering advice about what to do if you actually win.
